job_title: RN Hospice On Call in Cordele, GA
pros: Pay is good, benefits are good if you stay in network, and there is a great family environment throughout the facilities.
cons: Negativity among some employees, facilities are older and need some sprucing up.

pros:
Decent, hardworking medical staff & personnel . Org. makes an effort toward valuing personnel. 
A forward progressing IT Department with a solid Director. Good place to work and learn new technologies for the size of the org.
cons: Very busy environment at times. Occasionally departments can be demanding and rude toward service level staff/positions. Some of that just comes with a health care environment, some is unwarranted.
Small town, slow to improve at times.

job_title: Patient Account Representative in Vienna, GA
pros: The department I work in has a great work family and I enjoy what I do.
cons: Huge amount of work with little pay. There are not enough raises for the ones who truly work hard and care about their job. The amount of work you have is not realistic for one person to tackle. Quantity is valued for than the quality of your work.

pros: finding the perfect job, regular paycheck
cons: not hearing back you may find it harder to find a new job

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Cordele, GA
pros: The residents loved the care that was given by some of us
cons: The RNs and LPNs over the facility were lazy and basically stayed in he office until they were desperately needed. The administrators picked and chose who could get off and when based on popularity.

job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Cordele, GA
pros: Small Hospital with a family feel.
cons: Corrupted Administration and salaries and insurance is awful.

review_title: Upper management was difficult to work for, while the other employees were great to work with.
pros: Co-workers were a delight to work with. They were talented and caring. I enjoyed the team like atmosphere among our department.
cons: The CEO  was difficult to work with. He wasn't at all friendly.  He set goals that weren't obtainable with the limited resources we were given.

review_title: Good place to work over all
pros: Schedule is easy to work with. Everyone is pretty friendly! Payed time off system is pretty good too. Overall a good experience
cons: Sometimes situations come up where someone really needs to do something and things don't get handled. Getting raises can be a challenge at times
Some of the nurses(lpn's) try to talk down to the CNA'S.
